  • Method Details

    • numChars

      private static int numChars​(char[][] b, char ch)
      Parameters:
      b - matrix representing the board
      ch - character being searched for on the board
      Returns:
      the number of times ch is found traverses the board to find how many occurances of ch there are

    • valid

      public static boolean valid​(char[][] board)
      Parameters:
      board - matrix representing the board
      Returns:
      true if the board is valid, false otherwise ensures that there are 3 x's and 2 o's, or 3 o's and 2 x's, and that there is at least one more x or one more o

    • boardToString

      public static String boardToString​(char[][] b)
      Parameters:
      b - matrix representing the board
      Returns:
      the board as a string converts the board to a string of the characters in the matrix

    • stringToBoard

      public static char[][] stringToBoard​(String board)
      Parameters:
      board - the board string
      Returns:
      the board as a matrix creates a matrix with 3 rows and 3 columns and fills it according to the board string

    • whichLetter

      public static char whichLetter​(char ch)
      Parameters:
      ch - 1, 2, or 0
      Returns:
      ch as an x, o, or space converts a number 1, 2, or 3 to the character it represents (x, o, or blank)

    • makeBoard

      public static char[][] makeBoard​(String s)
      Parameters:
      s - string of 1s, 2s, and 0s representing the board
      Returns:
      a matrix representing the board converts a strings of 1s, 2s, and 0s to a matrix board

    • addOne

      private static String addOne​(String s)
      Parameters:
      s - original board string (9 characters; 0s, 1s, and 2s)
      Returns:
      the new string adds 1 to the last char, adjusting the rest of the characters to make sure the board is still valid

    • fillValues

      public static String[] fillValues()
      Returns:
      string array of all possible board strings fills an array with all the possible board strings from 000000000 to 222222222

    • diagonalWin

      public static boolean diagonalWin​(char[][] board)
      Parameters:
      board - matrix representation of the board
      Returns:
      true if x or o won on a diagonal checks both diagonals to see if all 3 are x's or all 3 are o's

    • rowWin

      public static boolean rowWin​(char[][] board)
      Parameters:
      board - matrix representation of board
      Returns:
      true if x or o won on a row checks each row if all characters in the row are x's and o's

    • colWin

      public static boolean colWin​(char[][] board)
      Parameters:
      board - matrix representation of board
      Returns:
      true if x or o won on a column checks each row if all characters in the column are x's and o's

    • isWin

      public static boolean isWin​(char[][] b)
      Parameters:
      b - matrix representation of board
      Returns:
      true if the board is a winner, false otherwise checks if the board is a win (by row, column, or diagonal)

    • isWinString

      public static String isWinString​(char[][] b)
      Parameters:
      b - matrix representation of the board
      Returns:
      row, col, dia depending on how the game was won (or loser if lost) returns a string if the game was won on a row, column, or diagonal (or loser if lost)

    • isWin

      public static boolean isWin​(String s)
      Parameters:
      s - string representation of board
      Returns:
      true if winner, false otherwise converts the board to a matrix and checks if it is a winner

    • isWinString

      public static String isWinString​(String s)
      Parameters:
      s - string representation of board
      Returns:
      row, col, dia depending on how the game was won (or loser if lost) converts the string to a matrix and returns a string if the game was won on a row, column, or diagonal (or loser if lost)

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args)
      Parameters:
      args - not used converts a board string to a matrix and tests if it is valid, a row winner, a column winner, a diagonal winner, and a winner
